hero.title: Axiome Trust Layer for Tokens & Projects
hero.subtitle: Token pages, verified links, reputation, and community feedback — all in one place.
hero.subtitle2: Create in 2 clicks anywhere. Build trust here.
hero.poweredBy: Powered by on-chain proof & wallet signatures

why.title: Why this exists
why.problemText1: Creating tokens is easy. Understanding them isn't.
why.problemText2: Most tokens launch without context: no official links, no clear description, no history, no community review — and trust collapses.
why.solutionText1: A verified profile layer for every token.
why.solutionText2: Axiome Launch adds project pages, token passports, community discussion, and transparent economics — so good projects stand out.

features.title: What you can do on Axiome Launch
features.subtitle: Everything a token needs to build trust — from creation to community feedback.

hero.title: Launch Docs
hero.subtitle: Axiome Launch — the trust and reputation layer for tokens and projects in the Axiome ecosystem.
hero.description: We're building a place where tokens and projects get a "passport": description, official links, update history, community discussion, ratings, and transparent rules. When creating a token is easy — the hard part is understanding what's behind it. We close that gap.

why.title: Why Axiome Launch is Needed
why.problemText: Creating tokens is becoming "2 clicks", but most have no proper showcase: who's the team, which links are official, what's the project plan, how the community rates the idea. The result — information noise and distrust by default.
why.solutionText: Axiome Launch adds context and trust: token and project pages, discussions, reputation signals, and transparent anti-spam mechanics.

tokenProfiles.title: Token Profiles
tokenProfiles.desc: Token pages with descriptions, links, trust statuses, and change history.

projectHub.title: Project Hub
projectHub.desc: Publish and discuss projects, including pre-launch phases.

verifiedLinks.title: Verified Links
verifiedLinks.desc: Protection against link spoofing and phishing.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.desc: Public treasury, clear fee rules, transparent tokenomics.

aiStudio.title: AI Studio
aiStudio.desc: AI-powered tokenomics generation, descriptions, and launch plans.

token.title: LAUNCH — Platform Utility Token
token.subtitle: LAUNCH provides access to platform features, strengthens reputation, and enables participation in voting and rewards. It's not a "hope coin" — it's a key to capabilities within Axiome Launch.

access.title: Access
access.desc: Lock LAUNCH to unlock platform tiers and premium features.

reputation.title: Reputation
reputation.desc: Stake-to-list shows you have skin in the game. Anti-spam by design.

rewards.title: Rewards
rewards.desc: Earn for useful contributions: reviews, reports, community help.

access.title: Access Tiers via Lock
access.subtitle: To keep access fair and protected from "buy for 5 min → vote → sell", key rights work through Lock — a voluntary lock-up of LAUNCH for a period.

reputation.title: Stake-to-List: Proof of Seriousness
reputation.subtitle: To reduce spam and increase trust, we introduce "stake-to-list" for token/project creator actions.

claim.title: Claim Token Page
claim.desc: Confirm ownership of a token page by staking LAUNCH. A signal that says "I have skin in the game."

update.title: Update Critical Info
update.desc: Update official links and key data with a full change history. Requires a stake for accountability.

safety.title: Safety & Appeals
safety.desc: In case of proven phishing, link spoofing, or mass spam — penalties via moderation rules with an appeals process.

rewards.title: Rewards for Value, Not Noise
rewards.subtitle: We incentivize ecosystem contributions: token reviews, quality problem reports, roadmap updates, helping newcomers. Rewards come from a dedicated pool and a share of platform revenue — to keep the program sustainable.

scamReport.title: Scam Report
scamReport.desc: Report phishing links or suspicious projects

projectUpdate.title: Project Update
projectUpdate.desc: Keep roadmap and project info up to date

rewards.poolSource: Funded from community allocation + platform revenue share

verified.title: Verified / Featured
verified.desc: Paid trust statuses and token/project promotion in explorer and homepage.

analytics.title: Pro Analytics
analytics.desc: Subscription for advanced analytics, alerts, and market insights.

laas.title: Launch-as-a-Service
laas.desc: End-to-end project packaging: landing pages, bots, integrations.

accelerator.title: Accelerator / Batches
accelerator.desc: Project selection, bundled launch campaigns, and community exposure.

feeSplit.title: Revenue Distribution (Transparent)
feeSplit.subtitle: We want the economics to work long-term: part of revenue goes to product development, part to community rewards, and part to grants and buyback mechanics to support LAUNCH demand.
feeSplit.note: Percentages may be adjusted via governance.

allocation.title: Supply & Distribution
allocation.subtitle: We follow transparency principles: public pool addresses, unlock calendar, and reports.
allocation.vesting1Desc: Liquidity pools deployed, community airdrop distributed
allocation.vesting2Desc: Partnership unlocks begin, accelerator grants distributed
allocation.vesting3Desc: First team tokens unlock, treasury starts community programs
allocation.vesting4Desc: Remaining team vesting, ongoing community growth allocation

governance.title: Governance & Voting
governance.subtitle: We use mechanics that reduce manipulation and the impact of "throwaway" votes: voting is available to users with locked LAUNCH, lock period restrictions apply, and voting weight can be quadratic (so whales don't dominate).
governance.faq1A: Users who have LAUNCH locked in a tier (Explorer+). Lock period must be active at the time of voting.
governance.faq2A: Quadratic voting is planned: the weight grows sub-linearly with locked amount, preventing whale dominance.
governance.faq3A: Community selects top projects via lock-weighted voting. Winners receive visibility boost and potential grant funding.
governance.faq4A: Revenue split percentages and reward parameters can be adjusted through governance proposals by Governor-tier holders.

transparency.title: Trust Layer: What We Show Publicly
transparency.item3: Verified links and page ownership status
transparency.item4: Risk flags (e.g., missing proof, frequent link changes)

disclaimer.text: LAUNCH is a utility token that provides access to platform features and community mechanics participation. We do not promise returns; reward rules and access depend on platform activity and policies.

lock.subtitle: Lock your LAUNCH tokens to unlock platform tiers, features, and community participation.
lock.noLocks: No active locks. Lock LAUNCH to get started.

gate.lockToUpgrade: Lock LAUNCH tokens to unlock this feature.

form.title: Create New Lock

page.title: Lock LAUNCH
page.subtitle: Lock your LAUNCH tokens to unlock platform tiers, premium features, and community governance participation.
page.disclaimer: Locking is a voluntary commitment. Tokens remain in your wallet but must maintain the required balance for the lock duration. Tier access is revoked if the balance drops below the locked amount.

tiers.title: Tier Comparison
tiers.subtitle: Higher tiers unlock more features. Lock more LAUNCH for longer to reach higher tiers.
